度估.definition: (Tw) to doze off (from Taiwanese 盹龜, Tai-lo pr. [tuh-ku])

度假.definition: to go on holidays; to spend one's vacation

度外.definition: outside the sphere of one's consideration

度姑.definition: (Tw) to doze off (from Taiwanese 盹龜, Tai-lo pr. [tuh-ku])

度娘.definition: alternative name for Baidu 百度[Bai3 du4]

度數.definition: number of degrees; reading (on a meter); strength (alcohol, lenses etc)

度日.definition: to pass one's days; to scratch out a difficult, meager existence

度日如年.definition: a day drags past like a year (idiom); time hangs heavy; time crawls when one is wretched

度牒.definition: Buddhist or Taoist ordination certificate issued by government

度過.definition: to pass; to spend (time); to survive; to get through
